question:
The commerce and industry ministry launched the ARTIS. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. It is for filing anti-dumping applications.
  2. The module was launched by the DGTR or Directorate General of Trade Remedies.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: ARTIS or Applications for Remedies in Trade for Indian Industry and other Stakeholders is an online module for filing anti-dumping applications. It can be used by domestic industries to speed up the resolution of dumping issues under Customs Tariff Act, 1975. Â Statement 2 is correct: The online module was launched by DGTR. DGTR falls under the ministry of commerce and industry. It is the apex body for administration of trade remedies. Trade remedies include anti-dumping, safeguard measures, countervailing duties, etc. The body is to launch modules for other types of applications next.
